name: GameEllen
description:
GAME ELLEN
The Game is a platform game that requires progress and strategy. Our character "Ellen" is in this dream; she must defeat the evil monsters, get rid of the traps, and open the doors called don't opened and impassable. This world is a wise design, as if it never ends. This adventure filled with colorful and pitfalls may be difficult for you, but when you make clever decisions, you will realize that the chapters are not that difficult. In this sweet and exhausting adventure, you have to help our character to pass all the challenges and wake up Ellen.


Features
    -You must collect keys throughout the game.
    -Your goal; find all the keys without dying and come to the exit.
    -Complete the game by defeating the latest monster.
